biotools.summary: A freely accessible, public archive of reports of relationships among medically important variants and phenotypes hosted by the NCBI. It integrates and cross-references data from multiple databases at NCBI. In addition to dbSNP and dbVar, it depends on MedGen to represent phenotype, Gene to represent genes, and on human RefSeqs to represent the location of sequence variation. Each record represents the submitter, the variation and the phenotype.

bioschemas.name: ClinVar
